summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Commuter Pool Program; authorizing execution of certain agreements in connection therewith, providing for continuation of the program during the period beginning September 1, 1977 and ending December 31, 1977, increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1977 Budget of the Engineering Department in connection therewith, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
